answers.answer: I think you need to see your doctor. It sounds like your sugar is dropping causing this. Does Diabetes run in your family?
None of my family have diabetes that i know of?
My suggestion would be to see a doctor and explain to him (or her) what is going on

question: Hello ,While im typing this, my whole body feels like its shaking, my hands i can see shaking slightly on the keyboard.    I haven't eaten today expect 4 slices of bread and tomato soup at lunch time and i had about 2 pints of Coca Cola.As i felt myself shaking just now i went and ate a fruit bar to put something inside me but im still shaking.   Ive had this before useally when i dont tend to each much all day ,once i eat a few things it goes away.Also 2 weeks ago i had bad flu and a chest infection and i was really coughing badly and being sick.    Since last week ive not felt right.     I feel like im sometimes in a dreamy state, like im not here and instead in a dream.Im not sure if its a sight problem or balance problem or maybe diabetes?    Can anyone shed any light on this please
title: Shaking and Dreamy feeling
